doc:examples.shacl:raw:
id: "R34fg663H9KW9MMSKISI"
  name: "Pawel Psztyc"
  birthday: "1983-10-20"
  gender: male
  url: "https://domain.com/profile/pawel.psztyc"
  image:
    url: https://domain.com/profile/pawel.psztyc/image
    thumb: https://domain.com/profile/pawel.psztyc/image/thumb
  tagline: Some text about me.
  language: en_GB
  etag: "W\\244m4n5kj3gbn2nj4k4n4"

doc:declares.schema-org:description:
An object representing a person in the API.
This object will be used in all methods returning a Person or list of people.
doc:declares.schema-org:name: A person resource
doc:declares.shacl:name: AppPerson

raml-shapes:range.schema-org:description:
ETag of this resource for caching purposes.
__This property will be ignored when creating an object.__
raml-shapes:range.shacl:name: etag

raml-shapes:range.schema-org:description: The brief description (tagline) of this person.
raml-shapes:range.shacl:name: tagline

raml-shapes:range.schema-org:description: Person full name. The input will be rejected if this property is not set while creating new object.
raml-shapes:range.shacl:name: name

raml-shapes:range.schema-org:description: The URL of this person's profile.
raml-shapes:range.shacl:name: url

raml-shapes:range.schema-org:description: The user's preferred language for rendering.
raml-shapes:range.shacl:name: language

raml-shapes:range.schema-org:description: A unique identifier for a person. It is a 32 bit string containing alphanumeric characters.
raml-shapes:range.shacl:name: id

raml-shapes:range.schema-org:description: The person's date of birth, represented as YYYY-MM-DD.
raml-shapes:range.shacl:name: birthday

raml-shapes:range.schema-org:description:
An image object representing an image object strored in the file store.
The image can be only included in the response. It has no effect if the Image appear in the
request. Endpoint handles image creation on it's own and clients can't process images
except of sending image data.
raml-shapes:range.shacl:name: amf_inline_type_2

raml-shapes:range.schema-org:description:
The URL of the image.
To resize the image and crop it to a square, append the query string **?sz=x**, where x is the dimension in pixels of each side.
raml-shapes:range.shacl:name: url

raml-shapes:range.schema-org:description: An URL to the thumbnail of the image. Thumbnails are 60x60px cropped images of the original image.
raml-shapes:range.schema-org:name: Thumbnail
raml-shapes:range.shacl:name: thumb

raml-shapes:range.schema-org:description:
The person's gender. Possible values includes, but are not limited to, the following values:
* "male" - Male gender.
* "female" - Female gender.
* "other" - Other.
raml-shapes:range.shacl:name: gender?
